pkgmetadata.longdescription: # ambhasAmbhas python library## Installing ambhasInstalling ambhas can be done by downloading source file (ambhas--<version>.tar.gz), and after unpacking issuing the command:: python setup.py installThis requires the usual Distutils options available.Or, download the ambhas--<version>.tar.gz file and issue the command:: pip install /path/to/ambhas--<version>.tar.gzOr, directly using the pip:: pip install ambhas ## UsageImport required modules:: import numpy as np from ambhas.errlib import rmse, correlationGenerate some random numbers:: x = np.random.normal(size=100) y = np.random.normal(size=100) rmse(x,y) correlation(x,y)# AuthorSat Kumar Tomersatkumartomer at gmail dot com## Changes0.1.0 * Initial version0.1.1* Minor corrections in setup.py files0.2.0* few packages added0.3.0* groundwater, sun_rise_set, soil texture module, etc. added0.3.1* manifest.in file edited0.3.2* extract_gis_data, richards, risat added0.4.0 * extract_gis_data, richards, risat added1.0.0 * Updated for Python3* Removed copula from this and is available now only as a seperate library# Any questions/commentsIf you have any comment/suggestion/question, please feel free to write me at satkumartomer@gmail.comYou may go through https://github.com/tomersk/learn-python to see the examples.
